text: Boxing at the 1980 Summer Olympics took place at the Indoor Stadium of the Olympiski Sports Complex in Moscow from 20 July to 2 August. Eleven boxing events (all men's individual) were contested with the participation of 271 fighters from 51 countries. ==Medalists== {| |-valign="top" | | | | * * * |-valign="top" | | | | * * * |-valign="top" | | | | * * * |-valign="top" | | | | * * * |-valign="top" | | | | * * * |-valign="top" | | | | * * * |-valign="top" | | | | * * * |-valign="top" | | | | * * * |-valign="top" | | | | * * * |-valign="top" | | | | * * * |-valign="top" | | | | * * * |} ==Medal table== ==Participation== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" |- !
